title: Fitness for the Prosecution
description: The plaintiff, Melissa, wants her boyfriend Henry to participate in an obstacle course event with her best friends so they can share a bonding experience. Henry objects on numerous fronts!
author: shows@maximumfun.org (Jesse Thorn)
